programme.title: City Under Siege
programme.desc: On a tour to Malaysia, a group of performers discover a cave occupied by the Japanese army during World War II. The performers are sprayed with a mysterious chemical that turns them into superhuman mutants.(n)

programme.title: The Moment
programme.desc: This film talks about four relationships: A couple breaking up yet holding tight; a father and a daughter meeting up after a long separation; a girl escaping from growing up; and two buddies' reunion after years of misunderstanding.(n)

programme.title: Love The Way You Are
programme.desc: Adapted from the novel "Peking University Students", this film tells the story of sweet and sour love among Xue Lin, Zhou Lin Lin and Fang Yu Ke, the student of the next home.(n)

programme.title: Your Name
programme.desc: Mitsuha, a high-school girl living in Japan's mountainous Hida region, is bored of country life and wishes she were a handsome Tokyo boy. Mitsuha begins switching bodies intermittently with Taki, a high-school boy living in Tokyo.(n)

programme.title: The Brink
programme.desc: Reckless police inspector Tung is on a mission to crack down on criminal Shing's gold smuggling scheme, yet fails to arrest him. As Tung continues his manhunt, he discovers Shing's involvement with triad boss Blackie.(n)

programme.title: Meet Miss Anxiety
programme.desc: Often violent and almost always rowdy, the perpetually drunk Qi Jia seems to stumble from one messy situation to another. She shares an apartment with her best friend Shuer and the shy Xiaoou whose apparent affections for Qi Jia go sadly unnoticed.(n)

programme.title: The Knight Of Shadows: Between Yin And Yang
programme.desc: A legendary demon hunter tracks down beasts that enter the human dimension, assisted by a lawman protege and a motley group of friendly monsters.(n)

programme.title: Push And Shove
programme.desc: When a Beijing scriptwriter's pet dog is brutally injured by the neighbour's Tibetan mastiff, the writer's quest for justice exposes the best and worst sides of human nature.(n)

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: The chief investigator of ICAC Chan King-chi's childhood friend Hui Chik-yiu does a spy job in a smuggler company even after he mysteriously flees to Australia.(n)

programme.title: Tricky Brains
programme.desc: Jing Koo, the Ultimate Expert, is hired by Macky Kam to get rid of Chi Man-Kit in order to be the manager of their company. Later, he finds himself being cheated by Kam and fiees.(n)

programme.title: The Villainess
programme.desc: Sook-Hee is a killer raised and trained in Yanbian, China. She hides her real identity as a killer and comes to South Korea. She dreams of having a different type of life, but becomes involved with two men.(n)

programme.title: 200 Pounds Beauty
programme.desc: Han-Na is a very large girl with a warm heart. She also possesses an unbelievable voice. Han-Na wants to become a pop singer, but due to her extra-large appearance, she can only work as a faceless singer.(n)

programme.title: Twa-Tiu-Tiann
programme.desc: Through a painting, a college boy unexpectedly travels 100 years back in time to the 1920s, when Taiwan was under Japanese rule.(n)

programme.title: The Miracles Of The Namiya General Store
programme.desc: In 2012, Atsuya and his two childhood friends do something bad and run into an old general store. They decide to stay there until the morning. Late into the night, Atsuya sees a letter in the mailbox.(n)

programme.title: Push And Shove
programme.desc: When a Beijing scriptwriter's pet dog is brutally injured by the neighbour's Tibetan mastiff, the writer's quest for justice exposes the best and worst sides of human nature.(n)

programme.title: Who Am I
programme.desc: Finding himself at a murder scene, bike courier Li Ziwei tries to escape, but the culprits force him off a bridge. The amnesia from his head injuries means he can't recognise the faces of his enemies, who have framed him for the crime.(n)

programme.title: Buddies In India
programme.desc: In an effort to save his house, a man accompanies the son of a recently-deceased CEO to India to recover his will.(n)

programme.title: Shuttle Life
programme.desc: A poor family struggles to cope with tragedy and mental illness in a fractured society.(n)

programme.title: The Viral Factor
programme.desc: International Security Affairs agent Jon is on a dangerous mission to escort a criminal scientist to another country. En route, a member of his team, Sean, turns out to be a traitor and shoots Jon in the head while kidnapping the scientist.(n)

programme.title: Finding Mr. Right
programme.desc: A woman from Beijing, pregnant with the child of her rich married boyfriend, flies to Seattle in order to deliver the baby. There she meets another Chinese immigrant man working as a driver, even as she finds her life beginning to change.(n)

programme.title: The Invincible Dragon
programme.desc: An undercover agent continually helps the police solve mysterious cases, which makes him a rising star. However, his impulsive personality drags him into endless troubles.(n)

programme.title: Buddy Cops
programme.desc: Short-tempered cop Fei constantly causes trouble with his impulsive crime-busting, and his latest transgression has earned him a transfer to the force's most useless department. There he gets paired up with Johnny, a wimpy desk-duty mama's boy.(n)

programme.title: Royal Tramp Ii
programme.desc: Lone-er, a member of the St Dragon Sect, is bent on eliminating the person who disclosed her true identity - Wilson Bond. But more complications ensue when Lone-er is assigned to protect the Prince, whose servant is none other than Wilson Bond.(n)

programme.title: Fist & Faith
programme.desc: Set during the 1930s after the Japanese invasion of Manchuria, a teacher and a group of students establish a study club to preserve their language and culture as an act of protest against the foreign invaders.(n)

programme.title: The Trading Floor
programme.desc: Years ago, Yip and his pupil Hong fought against powerhouses of the finance world. Yip is now a senior government official in cahoots with the business moguls. Hong wants vengeance. The whole finance world will pay the price.(n)

programme.title: Sakura Guardian In The North
programme.desc: Tetsu Ezure escapes with her son from Sakhalin Island after the Soviet Union invades the area as she struggles to survive as a refugee in Abashiri City's extreme cold weather and famine.(n)

programme.title: The Banquet
programme.desc: A loose adaptation of Hamlet, which is set in an empire in chaos. The Emperor, the Empress, the Crown Prince, the Minister and the General all have their own enemies they would like to finish off at a night banquet.(n)

programme.title: The Lucky Guy
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is Sing, aka The Prince of Egg Tarts, a renowned lothario who treats dating girls as an art form. He meets his match when he runs across his first love Candy who's been waiting for years to exact revenge, not renew their romance!(n)

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: Extreme sports lover Zhou Feng gets involved in an international illegal trade by accident, so he has to follow an international special agent Bruce to Budapest. Bruce and the rookies start a fight with the terrorists.(n)

programme.title: House Of The Disappeared
programme.desc: Twenty-five years ago, Mi-Hee was an ordinary housewife who was married to Chul-Joong with a son. Suddenly, her husband died and her son went missing. This all took place at their house.(n)

programme.title: Shed Skin Papa
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck man is tasked with taking care of his elderly father, only to discover that the man is shedding a layer of skin every day, making him younger in the process.(n)

programme.title: My Brilliant Life
programme.desc: My Brilliant Life is about the last moments of Ah-Reum, a 16-year-old boy infected with Progeria Syndrome. The kid, having the appearance of an old man, happily lives his remaining days in the loving arms of his parents.(n)

programme.title: All Because Of Love
programme.desc: Erkan, a frequent victim of bullies in high school, wants to reveal his affection for the beautiful Man-li. When Erkan confesses his love for Man-li, her current boyfriend Andy gives Erkan a good beating!(n)

programme.title: The Tag Along
programme.desc: After a funeral, a family is watching a trip video in which a weird-looking little girl in red is found tagging along the relative who passed away. But no one remembers seeing her anywhere during the trip.(n)

programme.title: White Lies, Black Lies
programme.desc: The film is inspired by a sensational real-life 1960s murder case. The wife of Rainbow Salon owner Su is found with her throat slit. Suspicion points to Su, who goes on the run with his first love. Their former classmate Mei Yu, a journalist, offers to tell their side of the story.(n)

programme.title: The Conman
programme.desc: Previously imprisoned for an accidental killing, King has returned to the world with his gambling skills intact, but his spirit gone. Help comes in the form of Skinny Dragon and his sexy sister Ching, who initially can't stand King, but eventually starts to warm to his undeniable charm.(n)

programme.title: Mothers
programme.desc: Hyo Jin is a 32-year-old woman. Two years ago, her husband died in an accident. Her husband has a 16-year-old son, Jong Wook, from a previous marriage. Hyo Jin begins to live with Jong Wook.(n)

programme.title: The Stool Pigeon
programme.desc: Police Detective Don Lee makes a bad call, causing a close informant to be injured. A year later, he must find a new man to go undercover inside a jewel-theft ring. Ghost Jr. doesn't want to do it, but Lee can offer deals and apply pressure that makes it hard to say no.(n)

programme.title: The Trading Floor
programme.desc: As Hong continues to decimate financial conglomerates, Fang notices CASH's activities. Hong asks her to investigate a mogul, but she discovers Yip's secret. Hong wonders if he is just a pawn in the game.(n)

programme.title: Forget Me Not
programme.desc: Lam Yi returns to the orphanage that she grew up in. On the way back one night, she encounters a physically-scarred child on the street with nowhere to go. Feeling sorry for her, Lam Yi takes her to the orphanage. However, an investigation into the child's past reveals spooky paranormal events.(n)

programme.title: The Truth About Jane & Sam
programme.desc: Sam, a Singapore guy who works in Hong Kong, falls in love with and opens up the wary character of Jane, a Hong Kong girl.(n)

programme.title: Forbidden City Cop
programme.desc: In Ancient China, Ling Ling Fatt is an Imperial agent whose lack of actual kung fu skills makes him initially unpopular with the Emperor. But Fatt's way with inventions gives him an edge on the invaders from the Gum province.(n)

programme.title: Monstrum
programme.desc: Yoon Gyeom is a loyal subject of King Jung Jong of Joseon. He struggles to fight against a monster that threatens King Jung Jong's life and a group of people trying to depose King Jung Jong.(n)

programme.title: Cherry Returns
programme.desc: A traumatised young girl who was abducted 12 years ago is found alive. However, she carries out crimes on the orders of her abductor, and now the police must stop her before it's too late.(n)

programme.title: Our Times
programme.desc: Lin Zhen Xin is a high-schooler who harbours a crush on her school's least ordinary, most adored boy Ouyang Fei Fan. After a chance encounter acquaints her with school ruffian Xi Tai Yu, she discovers that they have something in common: He has a crush on Fei Fan's female counterpart, Tao Min Min.(n)

programme.title: Pegasus
programme.desc: Five years ago, veteran driver Zhang Chi was suspended for illegal racing. When he returns to the game, he finds himself starting all over again.(n)

programme.title: The Princess And The Matchmaker
programme.desc: Princess Songhwa refuses her fate to marry one of four suitors. Seo Do-yoon, skilled at interpreting marital harmony signs, is selected as the person to ascertain her best match.(n)

programme.title: The Last Thieves
programme.desc: Young entrepreneur Yin Tzu-hsiang and his partners dream to change the unreasonable structure of the current economy with blockchain. Yin meets Hsu Ching, realising that he has to change himself first.(n)

programme.title: Full Strike
programme.desc: Ng Kau Sau was once the Queen of badminton who had given up on herself after being expelled from the sport. Ng's passion is reignited when she runs into a trio of former robbers who spend their post-prison lives practising badminton with an always-drunk coach.(n)

programme.title: The Vanished
programme.desc: The body of Yoon Seol Hee disappears at the National Institute of Scientific Investigation. Detective Woo Joong Shik seeks clues on her disappearance, while her husband Park Jin Han claims she is alive.(n)

programme.title: Drink Drank Drunk ()
programme.desc: A cheeky beer promotion girl falls for a hard-drinking, hard-luck French-Chinese fusion cuisine chef in a dazzling romantic comedy.(n)

programme.title: Plastic City
programme.desc: Chinese-Brazilian crime boss Yuda and his adopted son Kirin stand at the head of a massive pirated goods operation that brings in both money and influence. The good times run dry when Yuda lands in jail.(n)

programme.title: The Trading Floor
programme.desc: Hong falls into Yip's trap; by removing Yip's obstacles, Hong indirectly helps Yip to become Chief Executive of the MB. Just as it seems everything is over, it is in fact just the beginning.(n)

programme.title: The Nightingale
programme.desc: To keep the promise made to his wife, Zhigen decides to return to his native village to release his bird, a unique companion of his old years. He plans to make this journey alone, but Renxing, his spoiled granddaughter, is forced to leave with him.(n)

programme.title: A World Without Thieves
programme.desc: A con-team couple heads west after taking a city businessman for his BMW, but an encounter with a naive young carpenter travelling home with his life savings challenges their fate as thieves.(n)

programme.title: Haunting In Japan
programme.desc: In the middle of a white winter, a group of young men visits the countryside in Japan to shoot a music video. However, the house that they have rented is haunted by several ghosts.(n)

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: The story follows Chen Mo, a bar owner and 'ferryman' as he is slowly facing his own traumatic past whilst helping the people around him, including his co-partner Guan Chun, singer Ma Li and neighbour Xiao Yu.(n)

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: Yuan Yuan is one of the nation's reputable designers. She has the world at her fingertips, but she carries a secret that she cannot let go. A woman opens up a distant past that she's left behind in Hokkaido.(n)

programme.title: Fortune Buddies
programme.desc: Three out-of-luck urbanites are friends, and they spend their days in the unemployment centre. To help Luk earn money for his marriage, they try out street performing and become a sensation.(n)

programme.title: A Fool In Love, Love Like A Fool
programme.desc: Xiao-wei enjoys reading picture books written by his favourite author Kauff. One day he meets Blue, a mermaid. Since then, Xiao-wei's 'normal life' becomes not so 'normal'.(n)

programme.title: Big Match
programme.desc: Choi Ik-Ho is a martial arts star. Ace is a game planner who makes a game for the Korean upper class. He is a villain who turns the city into a big gameboard through technology. Ace and Choi Ik-Ho become adversaries as Choi Ik-Ho jumps into the game to save his brother.(n)

programme.title: Detective Chinatown
programme.desc: This action-packed comedy follows Qin Feng and his second cousin, Tang Ren, Chinatown's top detective, as they investigate a bizarre murder in which they become the main suspects. They find the world against them with just seven days to solve the murder case.(n)

programme.title: 77 Heartbreaks
programme.desc: When Adam and Eva break up after 10 years, Adam thinks the breach was caused by one trivial incident, but Eva knows she's already forgiven Adam 77 times!(n)

programme.title: 4love
programme.desc: Four up-and-coming Singapore directors, four love stories, all in one movie; each with their own merits telling the journey of love starting from teenage years to young adults, married life and finally old couples.(n)

programme.title: Suddenly Twenty
programme.desc: Parn is a stubborn old woman in her 70s whose only pleasure in life is to brag about her son who she single-handedly raised to be a professor. One day, she learns that her son is planning to send her off to a nursing home.(n)

programme.title: The Tricky Master
programme.desc: Major swindler Ferrari specialises in swindling the rich. Serious Crime Unit inspector Chan Foon is ordered to infiltrate Ferrari's organisation, but is uncovered. Chan decides to con a conman, and becomes a student of Wong Fu Si.(n)

programme.title: The Trading Floor
programme.desc: Hong delays implementation of the Tomorrow Fund and tries to block its issue. He employs numerous dirty tactics to get the senators to vote "no". In the end, the game centres around human nature.(n)

programme.title: Forever (Sg)
programme.desc: Joey, a video consultant, shares romantic 'faux' wedding videos. The idea of fantasy and reality is blurred when she falls madly in love with a handsome music teacher from Taiwan.(n)

programme.title: Wu Yen
programme.desc: Emperor Qi, the male ruler of an ancient kingdom overrun by warring tribes, is set to marry the warrior-heroine Wu Yen when a mischievous, bisexual sorceress known as Yin Chun falls in love with both of them and begins meddling in their affairs.(n)

programme.title: A Day
programme.desc: A mystery drama revolving around a father who commits an unethical act to save his daughter's life. Three years later, his actions return to haunt him, trapping him in an endless time loop.(n)

programme.title: Love Education ()
programme.desc: A dying old lady reminisces about her happier moments. Her daughter, Hui Ying, decides to move her father's grave from his hometown to beside her mother's grave.(n)

programme.title: Tomorrow Is Another Day
programme.desc: Wong Kam Fa is a middle-aged housewife whose life revolves around her 20-year-old autistic son. After learning that her husband is having an affair, she plots to take revenge on the mistress.(n)

programme.title: Filial Party
programme.desc: A group of contestants from various social backgrounds battle it out on a TV game show, I Am Filial, in which the one deemed most filial to his parents will win $1 million. Game show host Millionaire Liu (Mark Lee) plots to complicate things for the sake of increasing viewership ratings.(n)

programme.title: Ode To My Father
programme.desc: During the Korean war, a young boy is separated from his father, but in their parting moments he promises to take care of the family. As he grows up, he experiences some incredible events.(n)

programme.title: Blood Of Youth
programme.desc: At a Yuancheng orphanage, teenage brawler Su Ang is beaten to within an inch of his life by bully Da Gui for standing up for his girlfriend Lin Qiao, a fellow orphan. Later, Lin Qiao takes revenge on Da Gui by luring him to a rickety water tower.(n)

programme.title: Push And Shove
programme.desc: When a Beijing scriptwriter's pet dog is brutally injured by the neighbour's Tibetan mastiff, the writer's quest for justice exposes the best and worst sides of human nature.(n)

programme.title: Hollywood Adventures
programme.desc: Ming goes to America for love. Wai goes there for his movie dream. Wei goes there for a reason. When the three inadvertently stumble upon an illegal import operation, they are forced to band together and go on the run from the authorities who believe them to be guilty.(n)

programme.title: City Hunter
programme.desc: A self-indulgent private investigator winds up on a cruise ship full of rich patrons, gorgeous women, murderous terrorists and scarce food.(n)

programme.title: In The Line Of Duty 5 - Middle Man
programme.desc: Super cop Cynthia Khan and US Navy sailor David Wu fight global spies in Part 5 of this popular gals-with-guns movie series.(n)

programme.title: The Bachelor's Swan Song
programme.desc: Kenny and Maggie, lovers of long standing, have been scrimping and saving for their marriage. One day Maggie suspects that she is pregnant, and suggests an early wedding. Kenny is thunderstruck as he has just lost his every cent in the stock market.(n)

programme.title: Dances With Dragon
programme.desc: Aaron, a young successful Chinese businessman, drifts onto a rural island after a scuba accident. Mistaken for an illegal immigrant, he is forced to take refuge in a small family-run grocery store.(n)

programme.title: Goodbye Darling
programme.desc: Tai and Josephine are a merry couple. Tai brings his wife to his hotel's annual ball. Among his colleagues, there is a notorious seducer. Tai, with the help of his close friend Choi Sum, makes every effort to protect his wife, bringing themselves into a series of hilarious and comic situations.(n)

programme.title: Bullet In The Head
programme.desc: A John Woo classic set in Saigon and Hong Kong in 1967, about an epic test of love and loyalty between Tony Leung and Jacky Cheung.(n)

programme.title: Picture Of A Nymph
programme.desc: An atmospheric tale of ghost Joey Wang who hides in a portrait to evade an evil demon, with warrior Yuen Biao coming to the rescue.(n)

programme.title: Sixty Million Dollar Man
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays a rich playboy who is blown up by a mafia boss when he flirts with the boss' girl. Through a series of circumstances his professor makes him a synthetic body that allows him to change into a variety of household products.(n)

programme.title: Long Arm Of The Law
programme.desc: Thugs sneak into Hong Kong to rob a jewellery store, killing a cop during their getaway. They plan another heist while hiding from the police hunting them down to avenge their slain comrade.(n)

programme.title: The Magnificent Scoundrels
programme.desc: Valentino is a mediocre con-artist who crosses paths with Kwan, a fellow con-artist. Together, they impersonate various people and create numerous schemes to make money. Meanwhile, gangsters are making a scheme of their own.(n)

programme.title: Legend Of The Dragon
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays a naive young kung-fu student who leaves his rural home on a small island to find his fortune in Hong Kong under the dubious guidance of his uncle, who cons him into using his natural skills as a snooker player for financial gain.(n)

programme.title: Mr. Vampire II
programme.desc: Modern grave-robbing archeologists find perfectly-preserved specimens from the past of a family. These are vampires immobilised only by the paper spells pasted on their foreheads.(n)

programme.title: Final Justice ()
programme.desc: Cheung Tit Chu, a senior inspector of the Special Crime Investigation Department in the Police Force, likes to make decisions and execute duties independently. Cheung's character brings him into conflict with his new superior, David Law, and his work is always hindered by the latter.(n)

programme.title: Burning Sensation
programme.desc: A firefighter savages a spiritual shrine from an old burning building, which releases the gentle ghost of a Chinese opera singer, killed in a stage fire 30 years before.(n)

programme.title: Market Romance
programme.desc: Happy-go-lucky Sister Kot is the owner of a fish market who adores pop singer Alex. Her secret admirer is Keung, a frequent customer. Keung discovers that Alex may actually be his lost brother.(n)

programme.title: Changing Partner
programme.desc: Wong and Sandra are assigned to be the bait to trap Ripper, a killer.(n)

programme.title: The Yuppie Fantasia
programme.desc: Thirty-two-year-old Leung Foon has been married for seven years, but looking back at his marital life, Foon and his wife Ann seem to only have endless conflict. Deciding to live a life being a true man, Foon separates from Ann.(n)

programme.title: My Troublesome Buddy
programme.desc: Patrick Tam plays a successful but nasty salesman who finds there's more to life than money-grubbing and backstabbing, when a potentially fatal car accident brings him face-to-face with his conscience.(n)

programme.title: What A Small World
programme.desc: Unhappy couple Rosamund Kwan and Lawrence Ng go separately to Paris and London and rekindle friendships with Ray Lui and Nina Li.(n)

programme.title: Armour Of God
programme.desc: Jackie a.k.a. Asian Hawk is a former musician who becomes an adventurer and treasure hunter. After successfully stealing a sword from an African tribe, he has the weapon auctioned. He is reunited with his ex-bandmate Alan, who seeks his help as his girlfriend Lorelei has been kidnapped.(n)

programme.title: A Fishy Story
programme.desc: A Fishy Story saw Maggie Cheung winning her first Best Actress Award for her portrayal of a film extra with dreams of stardom in 1967 Hong Kong.(n)

programme.title: Plain Jane To The Rescue
programme.desc: Jane lands on a job as a governess, not to a child, but to a very rich man who wants to lead a life of the poor.(n)

programme.title: Looking For Mister Perfect
programme.desc: At a Malaysian resort, policewoman Shu Qi sets her sights on secret agent Andy On, hot on the trail of villain Simon Yam.(n)

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow
programme.desc: Mark is a man of honour living in a world of dishonour. As the sidekick to his former gang brother Tse-Ho, Mark finds himself out of favour when his boss is sent to the slammer. Ho comes out of jail repentant and is determined to turn over a new leaf for the sake of his policeman brother, Kit.(n)

programme.title: Project A
programme.desc: Set in early 1900s China, Project A involves the government Marine Forces' failed attempts to stop a band of pirate-smugglers led by Lo. Dragon Ma becomes frustrated over the Marines' inability to protect the innocent from the pirates, and teams up with a buddy and a former rival to stop them.(n)

programme.title: Fantasy Romance
programme.desc: Leung Chiu Wei and Willy are cartoonists. One day on the way to office, they knock down a lady ghost, Joey Wong. Joey's spirit is thus thrown into the human world.(n)

programme.title: Prison On Fire II
programme.desc: Ching is a prisoner in a Hong Kong jail that has a large population of Mainland Chinese prisoners. Ching escapes to see his young son. He surrenders himself to authorities, but the vengeful chief of security, Zau, arranges for Ching to be set up by the Mainland gang, led by the affable Dragon.(n)

programme.title: Crazy Romance
programme.desc: A star-studded comedy about an odd couple. The man is a kind-hearted small-time thief, while the woman is an imperious prison officer.(n)

programme.title: Beyond's Diary
programme.desc: Legendary Hong Kong band Beyond star in the 1991 feature film Beyond's Diary. In the tradition of the Beatles and Wynners films, this is a story of youth and music told with the genre mishmash and plucky energy of 90s Hong Kong cinema.(n)

programme.title: Mr Smart
programme.desc: Mr Smart, actually a silly guy, opens a fast-food shop at Wong's suggestion. The business goes up and down, just like his courtship of a lady.(n)

programme.title: Carry On Pickpocket
programme.desc: Pickpocket Sammo Hung falls for policewoman Deanie Yip and is convinced to steal for her. But Deanie is not what she seems to be.(n)

programme.title: Four Loves
programme.desc: Nina Li, Pauline Wong, Carina Lau and Crystal Kwok become sworn sisters in this nostalgic drama set in 1950s Hong Kong.(n)

programme.title: Those Merry Souls
programme.desc: This supernatural kung-fu comedy stars Yuen Biao as a stuntman who reluctantly takes up the family profession: a collector of dead souls.(n)

programme.title: Police Story 3 Super Cop
programme.desc: A Hong Kong detective teams up with his female Red Chinese counterpart to stop a Chinese drug czar.(n)

programme.title: Unfaithfully Yours
programme.desc: A comedy about a cheating husband on a trip to Japan who is tailed by a tabloid. All hell breaks loose when the wife shows up as well.(n)

programme.title: Rosa
programme.desc: Hsia and Lei Kung are two bumbling cops assigned to protect the gorgeous Rosa, girlfriend to a missing informer named Lee. But Rosa is wanted by more than just the law - the bad guys want her for leverage, and Lei Kung just wants her to be his girlfriend!(n)

programme.title: A Moment Of Romance 3
programme.desc: In 1938, the Chinese government is forced to retreat to Wuhan. Wai joined the air force with the purpose of paving his way toward a future career in politics. On a routine mission, Wai runs into Japanese fighter planes and is seriously injured.(n)

programme.title: Games Gamblers Play
programme.desc: Petty conmen Michael and Sam Hui try every scheme imaginable to make a fortune through gambling, with hilarious results.(n)

programme.title: The Fun, The Luck & The Tycoon
programme.desc: Rich playboy Chow Yun-Fat becomes a fast food worker in order to woo Sylvia Chang.(n)

programme.title: Web Of Deception
programme.desc: Brigitte Lin is a blackmailed executive in this tense thriller. Suspects include Joey Wang, Pauline Wong and Elizabeth Lee.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: Appearing as a vampire, Tin Ngai indicates that she is Shengmu's retribution. Ngai goes missing after she accidentally injures the Divine Dragon. Siu Ling catches up, only to be assaulted by Ngai.(n)

programme.title: Three Against The World
programme.desc: Detective Andy Lau must protect a priceless copy of the Koran against the schemes of gunman Norman Tsui Siu-keung and thief Teddy Robin.(n)

programme.title: La Brassiere
programme.desc: A Hong Kong bra company breaks tradition by hiring two men, Johnny and Wayne, to design an "ultimate bra" in three months. The head of the designing department, Lena, objects to their hiring and makes them look like fools.(n)

programme.title: The Last Message
programme.desc: Tim and Lee are employees of a mental hospital working as an orderly and nurse respectively. One day a crazy man named Cheng Ming, who carries a bag of trash, is institutionalised. Tim and Lee discover that the bag is full of artifacts from the Ming Dynasty.(n)

programme.title: The Magnificent Butcher
programme.desc: Lam Sai Wing, Master Wong Fei Hung's eldest disciple, is falsely trapped and accused by Ko who schemes to rape Lam's sister-in-law. What a trick!(n)

programme.title: The Wild Ones
programme.desc: Social worker Olivia Cheng attempts to tame four of Hong Kong's wildest reform schoolgirls, including Irene Wan and Loletta Lee.(n)

programme.title: Where's Officer Tuba?
programme.desc: Officer Tuba and Police Detective Chow attempt to hunt down a band of blackmailers. Unsuccessful in capturing the gang, Chow is gunned down and in his dying moment makes Tuba promise that he will defeat the gangsters and avenge his death.(n)

programme.title: Aces Go Places III
programme.desc: King Kong is enlisted by Queen Elizabeth and a faux James Bond to steal the crown jewels from the HK Police. However, the job is really an elaborate scam, and it pits King Kong against "Best Partner" and pal Kodojak.(n)

programme.title: Troublesome Night 2
programme.desc: Simon Lui, Louis Koo and Allen Ting are three DJs who undergo hauntings when various nasty events happen in their lives, making them spiritual targets.(n)

programme.title: City Hero
programme.desc: Mark and Anthony are policemen who want to become members of the special squad.(n)

programme.title: Lucky Stars Go Places
programme.desc: The lucky stars reunite again. This time, their mission is to investigate a case of international ammunition trade that involves two gangs.(n)

programme.title: Daddy Father & Papa
programme.desc: When her unruly son is kidnapped by gangsters after accidentally witnessing a hit, a desperate mother convinces her two old flames that the boy might belong to either of them, and persuades them to help her find him.(n)

programme.title: The Wesley's Mysterious File
programme.desc: Wesley, a special agent working in a secret UN department investigating extra-terrestrial sightings, is hot on the trails of a beautiful alien in town looking for her brother.(n)

programme.title: Iceman Cometh
programme.desc: A frozen Ming Dynasty royal guard and the equally frigid rapist-killer he's tracking are thawed out in modern-day Hong Kong.(n)

programme.title: Hong Kong
programme.desc: A woman narrates her personal story of the Japanese takeover of Hong Kong in 1941. She's Nam, a young and attractive daughter of a wealthy rice merchant.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: Siu Ling and Mou Yau come across Fuxi in Waiting Bar. Fuxi reveals his reluctance to see Shengmu. Worried about Tin Ngai, Siu Ling looks for her with Jim Tau and the SDU squad.(n)

programme.title: A Chinese Ghost Story II
programme.desc: Following the events of A Chinese Ghost Story, Ling Choi Sin returns to his hometown and, while fleeing from cannibals, gets himself imprisoned. With the help of his cell mate, scholar Elder Chu, Sin escapes and then finds himself crossing paths with rebel sisters Moon and Windy.(n)

programme.title: Dream Lovers
programme.desc: Chow Yun-Fat and Brigitte Lin discover they were lovers two millennia ago in this romance about the mysteries of reincarnation.(n)

programme.title: Queen's Bench III
programme.desc: Bumbling lawyer Alfred Cheung is assigned to a sensational murder case involving Tony Leung and Carina Lau, with farcical results.(n)

programme.title: Wu Yen
programme.desc: Wu Yen stars Anita Mui as Emperor Qi, the male ruler of an ancient kingdom overrun by warring tribes. Qi is set to marry the warrior-heroine Wu Yen when a mischievous, bisexual sorceress known as Yin Chun falls in love with both of them and begins meddling in their affairs.(n)

programme.title: No Compromise
programme.desc: Tackling serious crime is Danny Lee's routine job, and his wife DoDo Cheng always worries about his safety. Cheng forces Lee to choose between abandonment of job and divorce. On the other hand, Lee racks his brains over pursuing the robbery couple, Lam Wai and Pauline Wong.(n)

programme.title: The Greatest Lover
programme.desc: Chow Chin Chun, Tall Wai and Silly Chick separate when they illegally sneak into Hong Kong. Chow accidentally meets millionaire Big Mouth Sze, who invites Chow to pretend to be a passionate gentleman.(n)

programme.title: Winners & Sinners
programme.desc: Fresh from prison, five friends try to stay crime-free but inadvertently find themselves caught in a triad war.(n)

programme.title: Kung Hei Fat Choy
programme.desc: A classic Chinese New Year comedy starring Alan Tam as the money god who descends to earth to perform good deeds.(n)

programme.title: Operation Scorpio
programme.desc: This film is a unique combination of Drunken Master, Sanshiro Sugata and Karate Kid with ingenuity and creative moves you have never seen before!(n)

programme.title: Keep On Dancing
programme.desc: A mental hospital patient (Cora Miao) convinces her sane twin sister (Cora Miao) to trade places with her.(n)

programme.title: Doctor's Heart
programme.desc: Mark Cheng is a surgical intern involved in a love triangle with senior doctor Simon Yam and his girlfriend Michelle Reis.(n)

programme.title: I Have A Date With Spring
programme.desc: On the night of the Hong Kong 1967 Leftist Riots, Butterfly Yiu was given an accidental chance to perform the final show at the Flower Palace Nightclub when the original and star performer, Pak Long, was stranded at another venue.(n)

programme.title: Pom Pom Strikes Back
programme.desc: Two detectives, John and Richard, are good friends and partners. They are involved in the job of protecting a pretty young girl, May, who is a very vital witness.(n)

programme.title: Aces Go Places IV
programme.desc: A nefarious international cartel is after a super soldier formula, the secret of which may lie with King Kong. Meanwhile, Kodojak is still experiencing domestic weirdness with wife "Hot Tongue" Ho and son Baldy Jr.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: Mo Lui finally gains recognition from Bat Po and works with Mr X. On the other hand, Siu Fu has suffered ceaseless hardships taking care of Chang'e. Dai Lung then saves Fu and takes him home.(n)

programme.title: Story Of Kennedy Town
programme.desc: A story about friendship and treachery among pals Waise Lee, Mark Cheng and Aaron Kwok in the gritty Kennedy Town district of the 1960s.(n)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: In the near future, 10 men are voted as the 10 who could lead the world; on the list is Hong Kong scientist Dr Ken. When some of the figures on the list start dying in suspicious cases of spontaneous human combustion, the Hong Kong CID and the British MI6 get involved to try to protect Dr Ken.(n)

programme.title: The Good The Bad & The Beauty
programme.desc: A clever stewardess tries to double-cross an international smuggling ring by sneaking their loot into a hiding place.(n)

programme.title: My Father Is A Hero
programme.desc: Gong Wei is a Chinese government special agent who is assigned to work undercover in Hong Kong. To gain trust from the gang leader, Gong Wei has to take part in a shootout, taking Inspector Anita Fong as hostage.(n)

programme.title: Front Page
programme.desc: Hui, an owner of a Hong Kong tabloid magazine company, hires martial artist Bill Lee (Sam Hui) to help him get a good headliner for a magazine story to hopefully save his failing business.(n)

programme.title: The Young Master
programme.desc: Defeated in a Lion Dance competition, Dragon leaves the Red School in disgrace to look for his treacherous brother.(n)

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Uncle Tak, an old martial arts master, has severe problems with his former student Jonny, who wants nothing more than to kill his old master to show everyone who the real master is. Uncle Tak wants Jet, his best student, to come over from China to the US.(n)

programme.title: Pink Bomb
programme.desc: A bunch of Hong Kong residents go on a bus tour to Thailand and get mixed up with counterfeiters who are chasing an underage hooker who stole their bogus loot.(n)

programme.title: In The Line Of Duty III
programme.desc: Special Duties Unit officer Cynthia Khan joins forces with Japanese agents to track down murderous Red Army terrorists.(n)

programme.title: The Canton Godfather
programme.desc: Kuo Cheng-Wah is a kind-hearted country boy who is cheated of all his money when he arrives in Hong Kong. Depressed and destitute, he encounters Madame Kao, a poor woman selling flowers on the street. She urges him to buy a red rose, saying it will bring him luck.(n)

programme.title: Forever Yours
programme.desc: A beautiful young wife puts all her efforts into her family and her husband. One day, her friends accompany her to have a vacation on a big cruise. She unexpectedly bumps into her husband and his mistress.(n)

programme.title: Mummy Dearest
programme.desc: Lee Kam Lun is an intelligent but psychologically-unstable young man who is filial and loves his mum dearly. Trouble brews when he accidentally kills a junkie one night.(n)

programme.title: His Fatal Ways
programme.desc: Alfred Cheung plays a cop from Mainland China who has supernatural powers and is sent to Hong Kong to capture a pair of dangerous criminals.(n)

programme.title: New Journey To The West 8
programme.desc: The cast of New Journey To The West 7 returns with a new season of the series! Follow as they fulfill different missions and win dragon balls that make their dreams come true!(n)

programme.title: K-Ocean Pathfinders
programme.desc: Kim Nam-gil and his guests, including Park Sung-woong and Go Gyu-pil, travel across the Korea Strait from the Yellow Sea to the East Sea during a yacht voyage.(n)

programme.title: Tale Of The Nine Tailed
programme.desc: A romance fantasy drama that tells the story of a fearless producer determined to hunt down a nine-tailed fox who goes after evils that disrupt the order of the human world.(n)

programme.desc: A married couple facing the burden of married life happen to have a chance to change their fate completely. They thus lead two different lives without each other as a spouse.(n)

programme.title: Almost Genius
programme.desc: Almost Genius is a self-contained, half-hour comedy series that celebrates the people, places and things that try so hard to succeed but come up just a bit short. Hosted by April Richardson and Chris Fairbanks, the show features comedians and performers digitally inserted into viral videos to comment on and congratulate people for their bravery and ingenuity in snatching defeat from the jaws of victory. But Almost Genius doesn't mock, because as everyone knows, almost is awesome…and genius.(n)
